## Checklist

- [ ] I have verified that the project meets the [quality standards](CONTRIBUTING.md#筛选标准)
- [ ] The project was last updated within the last 6 months (unless historically significant)
- [ ] The project has clear documentation
- [ ] The project has community engagement (stars, forks, issues)
- [ ] I have checked that this resource is not already in the list
